customerConfig.title: Customer Configuration
customerConfig.confirmSaveMessage: Are you sure you want to save these changes?

documentationView.title: Setting up notifications and routes
documentationView.subtitle: Below are the options for setting up notifications and viewing route information.

notification.title1: Activate this option to receive all notification data without any filters.
notification.title2: Allows multiple notifications to be sent for each event, rather than just one.
notification.title3: Enable or disable notifications for events and movements.

input.title3: Name of the field that will be sent in the request body
input.title4: You can use static values or those already defined in the system.
input.title5: Value if you choose to send it as static

workorder.title: Description
workorder.subtitle: The predefined routes for the driver movement module are as follows:

routes.route1: Route to schedule a driver movement appointment.
routes.route2: Route to obtain or update the movement appointment date.
routes.route3: Route to manage the delivery related to the driver's movement.
routes.route4: Route to set or consult the driver's departure date.

driverMove.title: Description
driverMove.subtitle: The predefined routes for the driver movement module are as follows:

routes.route1: Route to close the work order status.
routes.route2: Route to obtain or update the last day off for the work order.
routes.route3: Route to manage the empty notification related to the work order.
routes.route4: Route to set or consult the work order delivery date.
routes.route5: Custom route for the work order - Route 1.
routes.route6: Custom route for the work order - Route 2.
